author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: و از اين بيانات محقّقه مثبته ادراک فرما مسائل خود را که سؤال نموده بودی، تا در دين  الهی راسخ شوی و از اختلافات بيانات انبياء و اصفياء متزلزل نشوی.
translation: From these incontrovertible and fully demonstrated statements strive thou to apprehend the meaning of the questions thou hast asked, that thou mayest become steadfast in the Faith of God, and not be dismayed by the divergences in the utterances of His Prophets and Chosen Ones.
